title: Inquiry-Based Science Education Instructional Design Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Science education theory and foundational instructional design methodology
context.additional_context: Provides a simulated environment where pre-service teachers design and implement inquiry-based science lessons in virtual classrooms.

learning_goals: Participants can implement science lesson scenarios across three stages (guided inquiry → structured inquiry → open inquiry) in VR environments through gradual instructional design.
Participants can analyze and evaluate teacher behaviors across eight domains (e.g., question generation, evidence collection) during inquiry-based lesson implementation using observation protocols.
Participants can derive improvement points for student-centered inquiry lessons through over 12 simulation cases over four weeks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
